com.interface21.jdbc.datasource.CannotCloseJdbcConnectionException

Packages that use CannotCloseJdbcConnectionException
com.interface21.jdbc.datasource Provides a utility class for easy DataSource access, and various simple DataSource implementations.  
 

Uses of CannotCloseJdbcConnectionException in com.interface21.jdbc.datasource
 

Methods in com.interface21.jdbc.datasource that throw CannotCloseJdbcConnectionException
static void DataSourceUtils.closeConnectionIfNecessary(java.sql.Connection con, javax.sql.DataSource ds)
          Close the given connection if necessary, i.e. if it is not bound to the thread and it is not created by a SmartDataSource returning shouldClose=false.
